steps.name: Configure
steps.run:

export LUA_INCLUDE="-I$LIBRARY_PATH"
export LUA_PREFIX="$PWD/.luarocks"
export LUA_EXEC_PREFIX="$PWD/.lua"
./bootstrap.sh
./configure
make

steps.name: Install system dependencies
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install jq libarchive-tools libfontconfig1-dev libharfbuzz-dev libicu-dev libluajit-5.1-dev libpng-dev luajit lua-sec lua-socket lua-zlib-dev luarocks

steps.name: Configure
steps.run:
./bootstrap.sh
./configure \
  --enable-developer-mode \
  BUSTED=false DELTA=false LDOC=false LUACHECK=false NIX=false STYLUA=false FCMATCH=true PDFINFO=false CARGO=true \
  --disable-font-variations \
  --with-system-lua-sources \
  --without-manual
echo "VERSION=$(./build-aux/git-version-gen .tarball-version)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc) -Otarget" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup developer environment
steps.run:
nix develop --command ./bootstrap.sh
nix develop --configure
nix develop --command make

steps.name: Run regression tests for which Ubuntu can't provide deps
steps.run: nix develop --command make regressions TESTSRCS='tests/variations-axis.sil tests/feat-unicode-softhyphen.sil'

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install jq libarchive-tools libfontconfig1-dev libharfbuzz-dev libicu-dev libluajit-5.1-dev libpng-dev luajit lua-sec lua-socket lua-zlib-dev luarocks

steps.name: Configure
steps.run:
./bootstrap.sh
./configure \
  --enable-developer-mode \
  BUSTED=false DELTA=false LDOC=false LUACHECK=false NIX=false STYLUA=false TYPOS=cat FCMATCH=true PDFINFO=false CARGO=true \
  --disable-font-variations \
  --with-system-lua-sources \
  --without-manual
echo "VERSION=$(./build-aux/git-version-gen .tarball-version)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc) -Otarget" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup developer environment
steps.run:
nix develop --command ./bootstrap.sh
nix develop --configure
nix develop --command make

steps.name: Run regression tests for which Ubuntu can't provide deps
steps.run: nix develop --command make regressions TESTSRCS='tests/variations-axis.sil tests/feat-unicode-softhyphen.sil'

steps.name: Install system dependencies
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install fonts-sil-gentiumplus ghostscript graphviz jq libarchive-tools libfontconfig1-dev libharfbuzz-dev libicu-dev libluajit-5.1-dev libpng-dev luajit lua-sec lua-socket lua-zlib-dev luarocks poppler-utils

steps.name: Configure
steps.run:
./bootstrap.sh
./configure \
  --enable-developer-mode \
  --without-developer-tools \
  ZSTD=$(which zstd) \
  --disable-font-variations \
  --with-manual \
  ${{ matrix.configuration[1] }}
echo "VERSION=$(./build-aux/git-version-gen .tarball-version)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc) -Otarget" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CARCH=$(uname -m)" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Append architecture to static binary
steps.run:
cp sile sile-${{ env.CARCH }}
sha256sum sile-${{ env.CARCH }} | tee -a sile-${{ env.VERSION }}.sha256.txt

with.files:
sile-${{ env.VERSION }}.pdf
sile-${{ env.VERSION }}.zip
sile-${{ env.VERSION }}.tar.zst
sile-vendored-crates-${{ env.VERSION }}.tar.zst
sile-${{ env.CARCH }}
sile-${{ env.VERSION }}.sha256.txt

build-from-dist.name: Build from source tarball without automake

steps.name: Install system dependencies
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install jq libarchive-tools libfontconfig1-dev libharfbuzz-dev libicu-dev libluajit-5.1-dev libpng-dev luajit lua-sec lua-socket lua-zlib-dev luarocks

steps.name: Configure
steps.run:
./bootstrap.sh
./configure \
    FCMATCH=true \
    PDFINFO=false \
  --enable-developer-mode \
  --without-developer-tools \
    DOCKER=$(which docker) \
  --disable-font-variations \
  --with-system-lua-sources \
  --without-manual
echo "VERSION=$(./build-aux/git-version-gen .tarball-version)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc) -Otarget" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Install system dependencies
steps.run:
brew install \
  autoconf \
  automake \
  expat \
  ghostscript \
  graphviz \
  libtool \
  luajit \
  luarocks \
  poppler \
  rust \
  unzip \
  zlib
brew link icu4c@76 --force
brew link zlib --force
brew link expat --force
brew install --cask font-gentium-plus

steps.name: Configure
steps.run:
./bootstrap.sh
./configure \
  --enable-developer-mode \
  --without-developer-tools \
  --with-system-lua-sources \
  --with-manual
echo "VERSION=$(./build-aux/git-version-gen .tarball-version)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
# Note don't use -Otarget for macOS, Homebrew's old make is too buggy
echo "MAKEFLAGS=-j$(sysctl -n hw.ncpu)" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup developer environment
steps.run:
nix develop --command ./bootstrap.sh
nix develop --configure
nix develop --command make

steps.name: Run regression tests for which Ubuntu can't provide deps
steps.run: nix develop --command make regressions TESTSRCS='tests/variations-axis.sil tests/feat-unicode-softhyphen.sil'
